page.title: 03Newborough Parish Council
page.content:
Members of{Newborough Parish Council} are elected, with other members co-opted if necessary, and meetings are held at monthly intervals.
Responsibilities cover -: { {1.Commenting to the District Council { on local planning applications. {2.Street lighting and reporting to the { Area Surveyor on road problems. {3.Purchase of available land for { village use. {4.Giving encouragement to all village { organisations. {5.Upkeep of children's playing field. {6.Assisting Parochial Church Council { with the upkeep of the church clock. {7.Organising a village Christmas Tree. {8.Any minor problems not dealt with by { the District Council. }
